A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Different. Exciting. Shocking.

As Luke said in the trailer\, "This is not going to go the way you think"

Bold twists\, and wonderful surprises scattered throughout the film.

I really don't want to give a spoiler filled review\, so i will say this:

If you are looking for homages to the original films or "Legends" (expanded universe content)\, and the same old same old: You're not going to like it.
If you have been wanting more out of the Star Wars saga: This might come close to your expectations.
